body_html:
@gunan Statically linking to C Run Time is currently the default option in Bazel, but it can be reconfigured to dynamic linking easily, I will send a change for this.

For the error, that's a flaky failure caused by bazelbuild/bazel#2675, but unfortunately, we haven't found the root cause for this.
body_text:
@gunan Statically linking to C Run Time is currently the default option in Bazel, but it can be reconfigured to dynamic linking easily, I will send a change for this.
For the error, that's a flaky failure caused by bazelbuild/bazel#2675, but unfortunately, we haven't found the root cause for this.
body:
@gunan Statically linking to C Run Time is currently the default option in Bazel, but it can be reconfigured to dynamic linking easily, I will send a change for this.

For the error, that's a flaky failure caused by https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/2675, but unfortunately, we haven't found the root cause for this.
